message: Let's split the money 60/40.  I believe this is a fair starting point that allows us both to benefit.
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  How about a 55/45 split in my favor? This way I get a bit more, but you still get a good chunk before inflation eats away at it.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but still favors you too much.  Let's meet in the middle. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor, mirroring your previous offer.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We're wasting valuable time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
